description: The Amazebowls Vegan food truck specializes in acai bowls that are also gluten free and dairy free. The bowls are great for dessert, breakfast, lunch, or as a snack! The health benefits are endless as our main ingredients are super fruits and healthy and delicious toppings such as granola and coconut shavings.Owners Bryan Leong and Desmond Ng started out working in finance, but switched to the food truck business and never looked back. As they found, you can learn and teach far more from a food truck than you ever could from school. How did this all come about, and what are their plans for the future? Read more on the Roaming Hunger blog: http://roaminghunger.com/blog/6926/amazebowls-1-part-acai-1-part-granola-2-parts-love
name: Amazebowls
